Las_Vegas.Las Vegas Festival Grounds:
The Las Vegas Festival Grounds (formerly MGM Resorts Festival Grounds) is an open-air venue located on the north-end of the Las Vegas Strip, in Las Vegas, Nevada. The venues north of the Circus Circus Las Vegas.
It is the third open air venue to open in Las Vegas, behind the Las Vegas Village (on the south-end of the strip) and the Downtown Las Vegas Event Center (in Downtown Las Vegas).
